name: Fixed Version of Grey Hearts - Roblox
description: This is the fixed version of the original, the background works. Credits go to >Mungfali< for the image, this image is pretty easy to remake so finding the original creator would put me through unnecessary amounts of pain. This code was created by me, do give feedback for improvements in the comments. If you want more fixed roblox styles just click BoopBop at the top, or you can click DittoDino below for some mediocre youtube progressbars.

user.name: BoopBop
user.about:
It was previously goofy@gmail.com
I am the alt of DittoDino, who'll be the main source of info.

additional_info: This is the Alt of DittoDino. Disclaimers: Won't work for tablets/iPads or phones. The style not appearing/downloading bug is an issue with the extension, not style. Help Sections Links Below. English Help Section. French Translated Help Section - Section d'aide traduite en français - cliquez ici. Russian/Cyrillic Translated Help Section - Русский/кириллица переведенный раздел помощи - кликните сюда. Spanish Translated Help Section - Sección de ayuda traducida al español - haga clic aquí. The original theme was this Gray Hearts. It's a link. 27 August 2022 - Released. 17 April 2023 - Revamped style with new base code.
